Question
========

About 11% of people in the Netherlands aged 17 to 23 years are early school leavers. If you randomly choose five people from this age group, then random variable X: the number of early school leavers. What is then the probability of P(X = 2)?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,012
* 0,085
* 0,558
* 0,792

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.012: Incorrect
* 0.085: Correct
* 0.558: Incorrect
* 0.792: Incorrect
